Wolfblade:;

She finished and looked at Elita. "Uh, yeah. Well, I'll fight to the 
end for the little one. But, kids aren't my cup of energon. You know 
how it is. Wars leave little time for things like that."  She looked 
back at Elita and sighed. Part of her wanted something like 
that,someday. The other part was deathly afraid of something so 
fragile and smaller than her own form.  She looked at Malice. "Let's 
head to the mess hall and talk."
